EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Busch Stadium Exec St Louis_Q317.Busch Stadium Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Busch Stadium Executive Event Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Busch Stadium Executive event in St. Louis on August 10th. You'll be joining leaders from Pivotal, Sumo Logic & New Relic for a panel discussion to help you plan your journey to cloud migration and digital transformation.
Upon arrival to Busch Stadium please enter through the 700 Clark Street Lobby. After the meeting we invite everyone to our Party Suite for the Cards vs. KC Royals game. We will be sending a reminder email closer to the event with parking information and additional logistics.
Date: Thursday, August 10, 2017
Time:
4:00PM to 9:00PM
Location: Busch Stadium 700 Clark Avenue Sat. Louis, MO, 63102 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Busch+Stadium/@38.6226188,-90.1928209,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0xa57962d7e3509f27?sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwi63Pjq-YbUAhWW14MKHQYQCA4Q_BIIjAEwCg]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us at fieldevents@pivotal.io <[[mailto:fieldevents@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal, New Relic and Sumo Logic Teams
See Agenda <[[]]>
